thread.title: JazWings™ Idea Incubator Platform Launches At New York Comi
thread.title_full: JazWings™ Idea Incubator Platform Launches At New York Comi

author: JazWings
title: JazWings™ Idea Incubator Platform Launches At New York Comi
text:
NEW YORK , Oct. 8,   JazWings, the innovative Idea incubator platform "Where big ideas take flight™" will offer attendees an opportunity to discover the platform, become members and vote for  the next big Idea at New York Comic Con.  JazWings™ will provide an exclusive preview and limited edition giveaways. A subsidiary of the award-winning product manufacturer, Jazwares™, JazWings™ is the ideal resource for toys, comic, gaming, tech, and pop culture fans. Available for Creators who want to take their Idea to the next level and for fans who want to vote on Ideas. JazWings™ is the go-to hub for creative thinkers of all varieties With JazWings™, Creators upload their Ideas and Community Members steer their popularity by voting and supporting the ones they like most. Once an Idea reaches 100% of the votes, it will be presented to the JazWings™ Panel who will decide if the Idea will move forward to the Support phase to start a crowdfunding campaign. If successful the idea might end up on store shelves, the web, in an app, or in the movie theatre. Creators earn money as they move through the JazWings phases and receive participation payments of the net revenues for the life of their Idea.  
NYCC attendees with ideas for games, apps, films, toys, animations, or something so wild it can't be categorized, can bring them to the JazWings™ Lounge, located at Booth #556 in the Javits Center.  The JazWings™ team will be meeting with Creators during the length of the show. Meetings are by appointment only and reservations can be made at the booth. Throughout the show, visitors can stop in for a preview of the JazWings ™ site.
Attendees that sign up to become a JazWings™ Community Member at the lounge will be entered to win an exclusive JazWings™ "Start Creating" kit designed to get you thinking about your big idea. Kit contents include the JazWings™ "What Should I Create Today?" dice game, creative "juice", Team JazWings™ stickers, Wat USB, and cool Team JazWings™ lunchbox to hold the food for thought. 
JazWings™ will also be filming attendee feedback and reactions to the Site and Creator meetings.  The most amusing and insightful comments will be featured on the JazWings™ Official Blog that debuts mid-October 2015 . 
JazWings™ will be New York Comic Con, Booth #556 from October 8 - 11 at the Javits Convention Center.  For more info about JazWings™, visit www.jazwings.com .
